snippet: The decision by Paul Singer, a New York investor, was a blow to Jeb Bush and could swing millions of dollars in contributions to the Florida senator in his pursuit of the Republican nomination.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

abstract: Billionaire businessman Paul Singer endorses Marco Rubio for president, devastating blow to Rubio's Republican rival Jeb Bush, who competed fiercely for Singer’s blessing; says he is convinced that Rubio is only candidate that can defeat Hillary Rodham Clinton in general election.
lead_paragraph: The decision by Paul Singer, a New York investor, was a blow to Jeb Bush and could swing millions of dollars in contributions to the Florida senator in his pursuit of the Republican nomination.

headline.print_headline: In Blow to Bush, a Major Donor Chooses Rubio
headline.main: Paul Singer, Influential Billionaire, Throws Support to Marco Rubio for President
